relationship, 
especially	if	this	is	your	first	
baby. Some people cope with 
these changes easily, others 
find	it	harder.	Everybody	is	
different.
It is quite common for 
couples	to	find	themselves	
having arguments every now 
and then during pregnancy, 
however much they are 
looking forward to the baby. 
Some arguments may 
be nothing to do with the 
pregnancy, but others may 
be because one of you is 
worried about the future and 
how you are going to cope.
